data.name: Bunny Ribbit
data.detailed_description:
Bunny Ribbit is a tough-as-nails puzzle platformer about a toad and a rabbit on a quest to board Noah's ark.
Traverse wacky worlds as you escape the ravaging flood and its rising waters. Teamwork will provide creative solutions to the challenges presented by stages in this retro-style homage to games of past.

Features:
  • Retro-style graphics and gameplay
  • Linear level progression
  • Multiple items and powerups
  • Various collectables
  • Multiple endings

Mechanics
  • Run
  • Jump
  • Fly - Fly on your own or lift your froggy pal high into the air
  • Roll - Ride upon the toad as if he were a log or let him roll into enemies on his own

Try to collect as much as possible to unlock the true ending!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X El Capitan 10.11 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
